name: Bhupendra Singh Parihar
title: Front End Engineer
objective: To make high-quality, exciting, and fun web and mobile applications that are challenging, provide opportunities to learn new technologies, and allow me to work with other highly motivated and talented developers.
aboutme: I am passionate about writing and testing my code, learning new things, and teaching others. I enjoy writing and contributing to open source software.  I also enjoy speaking at conferences and local user groups about JavaScript.

projects.name: www.alexandermini.com
projects.description: Alexander Mini is one of the most famous car dealer website which requested for a full white plane theme to be created with in short span of time. Not only we created this theme for http://www.alexandermini.com/ but for all the mini dealers in US.

projects.name: www.sewell.com
projects.technologies: Object Oriented Javascript, Jasmine, GoogleMapApi, Responsive Design
projects.description: Project sewell is a website build for group of car dealers in United States. It is a responsive website supporting digital marketing of cars.

projects.name: Flex+ Solution : http://stevinsonauto.com on mobile
projects.technologies: jQuery, Bootstrap, RequireJS, CSS3, LESS, HTML5, Jasmine
projects.description: Flex+ is a solution for dealer websites which are not responsive. It is adaptive layout design for each page and rendering using wicket code. Url: http://www.stevinsonauto.com/?device=mobile

projects.name: ACB (Appointment CallBack)
projects.description: ACB provide a call tracking and scheduling system for business process executives.

projects.name: Contact Management System
projects.technologies: jQuery, Backbone.js, LESS, HTML5, Twitter Bootstrap, Jasmine
projects.description: CMS generates scripts for the agent (say BPO) to communicate easily with the client. These scripts or web pages are able to collect data from the user and can be configured any time to change the flow of business.

projects.name: LRM (Loan Resolution Model)
projects.description: LRM is one the highest revenue-making product of Altisource for its client Ocwen(Home Mortgage company in US). As the name suggest it provides various options to the customer which are default or going to be default on their loan, i.e., imminent default. My responsibility is to provide a web app for doing so.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.responsibilities: At Ness technologies I worked for CDK Global which provide digital marketing website for car dealers all over the world, moslty for US. My responsibilities includes understanding the client requirement and create differnt widget that can be easily placed on any dealer website.
experience.achievements: Introduced Dealer Locator widget using the googlemap api on various sites to easily navigate to nearest dealer.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.responsibilities: Implement best practices to JavaScript codebase, develop new functionality and create new layouts, teach advanced Javacript techniques to the team
experience.achievements: Introduced unit testing, continuous integration, source control, and development best practices to the team.  Started the Lunch and Learn program where team members teach each other new technologies and techniques.

experience.title: Physics & Computer Science Faculty

experience.achievements: Taught various aspects of physics, took the initiative of smart learning pearson course in school.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.responsibilities: Develoment and Design of a system which facilitate call center executive to track and manage their calls.
experience.achievements: Lead efforts to re-write procedural legacy application using an object-oriented approach. Act as scrum master to drive the team.
